name: odbc_columns
purpose: Lists the column names in specified tables

return.description:
Returns an ODBC result identifier or FALSE on failure.The result set has the following columns:
   
    TABLE_QUALIFIER
    TABLE_SCHEM
    TABLE_NAME
    COLUMN_NAME
    DATA_TYPE
    TYPE_NAME
    PRECISION
    LENGTH
    SCALE
    RADIX
    NULLABLE
    REMARKSThe result set is ordered by TABLE_QUALIFIER, TABLE_SCHEM and
   TABLE_NAME.
